text: tavada gambada arabin aturin, allah ha paramanta dinaya visvasa karana, taman viyadam karana dæ valin, allah veta tamanva samipa karagænima ha dharma dutayanange prarthanavan laba gænima, margayak bavata pat kara ganna aya da veti. dæna ganu niyata vasayenma eya ovunata samipa karavimaki. allah ohuge karunava tulata ovun va ætulat karayi. niyata vasayenma allah ati ksamasiliya. karuna gunayen yuktaya
